title: Is this considered a screen defect? Pixel 3
content:
I was wondering if this is in any way normal for the pixel phone screen. I've only had it for like a day and haven't even used it. 
There seems to be this faint white shade in the center of the screen. 
At max brightness / using the phone in a bright place or when using a multicolored wallpaper it's barely noticeable but at night / when the brightness it lowered down, one can easily detect it. Thanks in advance!

First Photo = Max Brightness
Second = Low Brightness
Third = Pointing out the issue.
